stakingSdk.faq1Question: How do I get an API key?
stakingSdk.faq1Answer: Visit the TBURN Developer Portal to request an API key. Read-only operations don't require authentication.
stakingSdk.faq2Question: What is the minimum stake amount?
stakingSdk.faq2Answer: Minimum stake varies by pool tier. Bronze pools start at 1,000 TBURN, while Diamond pools require 500,000 TBURN.
stakingSdk.faq3Question: How long is the unbonding period?
stakingSdk.faq3Answer: The standard unbonding period is 21 days. Early withdrawal may incur penalties depending on the pool.
stakingSdk.faq4Question: Can I stake from a hardware wallet?
stakingSdk.faq4Answer: Yes, the SDK supports Ledger and Trezor hardware wallets via Web3 provider integration.
stakingSdk.faq5Answer: You can enable auto-compound when creating a stake position. Otherwise, rewards must be manually claimed or compounded.
stakingSdk.faq6Answer: Rewards are calculated based on pool APY, stake amount, and bonus multipliers. The AI optimizer adjusts rates dynamically.

v4-mainnet-launch.title: TBURN v7.0 Mainnet Launch: A New Era of Blockchain Innovation
v4-mainnet-launch.description: After months of rigorous testing, TBURN v7.0 mainnet is now live with revolutionary AI-enhanced consensus and enterprise-grade features.
v4-mainnet-launch.author: TBURN Core Team

content.0: We are thrilled to announce that TBURN v7.0 mainnet has officially launched, marking a significant milestone in our journey to revolutionize blockchain technology. This release represents the culmination of over two years of research and development.
content.2: AI-Enhanced Committee BFT Consensus: Our proprietary consensus mechanism combines traditional Byzantine Fault Tolerance with advanced AI algorithms for optimal validator selection and network security.
content.3: Dynamic Sharding System: The network now supports automatic load balancing across multiple shards, enabling unprecedented scalability without sacrificing decentralization.
content.4: Triple-Band AI Orchestration: Three independent AI systems (GPT-5, Claude Sonnet 4.5, Llama 4) work in harmony to optimize network operations, from transaction routing to resource allocation.
content.5: Enterprise Token Standards (TBC-20, TBC-721, TBC-1155): Our enhanced token standards provide quantum-resistant security and built-in compliance features for institutional adoption.
content.6: The mainnet launch includes a comprehensive DeFi ecosystem with DEX/AMM, lending protocols, liquid staking, NFT marketplace, and cross-chain bridge capabilities.
content.7: We invite developers, validators, and users to join us in building the future of decentralized finance on TBURN v7.0.

triple-band-ai-revealed.title: Triple-Band AI Architecture Revealed: The Future of Blockchain Intelligence
triple-band-ai-revealed.description: An in-depth technical exploration of how TBURN leverages three AI systems for optimal blockchain performance.
triple-band-ai-revealed.author: Dr. Sarah Chen

content.0: The TBURN v7.0 AI Orchestration system represents a breakthrough in blockchain technology, combining multiple AI providers for redundancy, accuracy, and optimal decision-making.
content.2: Primary Band (GPT-5): Handles complex analytical tasks including validator trust scoring, anomaly detection, and predictive maintenance.
content.3: Secondary Band (Claude Sonnet 4.5): Specializes in code analysis, smart contract auditing, and natural language processing for governance proposals.
content.4: Tertiary Band (Llama 4): Provides high-throughput, low-latency processing for real-time transaction routing and load balancing decisions.
content.5: Cross-Band Interaction: When a decision requires high confidence, all three AI systems independently analyze the situation. A consensus mechanism then combines their outputs, weighting each based on historical accuracy for similar decision types.
content.6: Feedback Learning System: Every AI decision is tracked and evaluated against actual outcomes. This continuous feedback loop enables the system to improve over time, with accuracy metrics currently exceeding 99.7% for validator selection decisions.
content.7: The result is a self-improving, fault-tolerant AI layer that enhances every aspect of blockchain operations.

global-partnership-expansion.title: Global Partnership Expansion: TBURN Joins Forces with Industry Leaders
global-partnership-expansion.description: Strategic partnerships announced to accelerate TBURN ecosystem growth and global adoption.
global-partnership-expansion.author: Business Development Team

content.0: TBURN is proud to announce a series of strategic partnerships that will accelerate our ecosystem growth and bring blockchain technology to millions of new users worldwide.
content.2: Enterprise Integration Partners: Leading financial institutions and technology companies have committed to integrating TBURN's enterprise solutions.
content.3: Developer Ecosystem: Major development studios and blockchain tool providers are building on TBURN.
content.4: Infrastructure Partners: Cloud providers and data center operators are supporting our global node network.
content.5: Regional Expansion: These partnerships enable TBURN to establish presence in key markets across Asia, Europe, and the Americas, with localized support and compliance frameworks.
content.6: Developer Resources: Our partners are contributing to comprehensive developer resources, including SDKs, documentation, and training programs.
content.7: We're excited about the opportunities these partnerships create for our community and the broader blockchain ecosystem.

staking-program-details.title: Staking Program Details: Maximize Your TBURN Rewards
staking-program-details.description: Complete guide to TBURN staking tiers, rewards, and how to maximize your returns.
staking-program-details.author: TBURN Economics Team

content.0: The TBURN staking program offers multiple ways to earn rewards while supporting network security. Here's everything you need to know.
content.2: Bronze Tier: Minimum 1,000 TBURN - 8% base APY
content.3: Silver Tier: Minimum 10,000 TBURN - 12% base APY + governance rights
content.4: Gold Tier: Minimum 100,000 TBURN - 18% base APY + priority validator selection
content.5: Platinum Tier: Minimum 1,000,000 TBURN - 25% base APY + all benefits
content.6: Lock Period Bonuses: Longer lock periods provide additional APY bonuses up to 50% extra.
content.7: Auto-Compounding: Enable auto-compounding to automatically reinvest your rewards and maximize returns.
content.8: Getting Started: Visit the TBURN staking dashboard to begin earning rewards today.

trust-score-deep-dive.title: Trust Score Deep Dive: How TBURN's AI Evaluates Network Security
trust-score-deep-dive.description: Comprehensive explanation of the AI-powered Trust Score system that ensures network integrity.
trust-score-deep-dive.author: Security Team

content.0: The TBURN Trust Score system is a revolutionary approach to network security, leveraging AI to continuously evaluate and score every participant in the ecosystem.
content.2: Real-time Monitoring: AI systems continuously analyze validator behavior, transaction patterns, and network contributions.
content.3: Multi-factor Analysis: Scores consider uptime, response time, block production accuracy, governance participation, and historical reliability.
content.4: Dynamic Adjustment: Trust scores update in real-time based on recent activity, with more recent actions weighted more heavily.
content.5: Trust Score Impact: Higher trust scores unlock benefits like priority transaction processing, reduced fees, and enhanced governance voting power.
content.6: Maintaining High Scores: Consistent uptime, timely block production, and active governance participation are key factors in maintaining high trust scores.
content.7: The Trust Score system ensures that the most reliable participants are rewarded, creating a self-reinforcing security mechanism.

sdk-2-released.title: TBURN SDK 2.0 Released: Build Faster with New Developer Tools
sdk-2-released.description: The new SDK version brings improved APIs, TypeScript support, and comprehensive documentation.
sdk-2-released.author: Developer Relations

content.0: We're excited to announce the release of TBURN SDK 2.0, featuring significant improvements for developers building on our platform.
content.2: Full TypeScript Support: Complete type definitions for all SDK functions and objects.
content.3: Simplified APIs: Streamlined interfaces for common operations like transactions, staking, and smart contract interactions.
content.4: React Hooks: Pre-built hooks for easy integration with React applications.
content.5: Better Error Handling: Comprehensive error types and messages for easier debugging.
content.6: Getting Started: Install with npm: npm install @tburn/sdk
content.7: Documentation: Visit our developer portal for comprehensive guides, API references, and example projects.
content.8: The SDK 2.0 represents our commitment to making TBURN development accessible and enjoyable.

quantum-resistant-cryptography.title: Quantum-Resistant Cryptography: Securing TBURN's Future
quantum-resistant-cryptography.description: How TBURN implements quantum-resistant algorithms to protect against future threats.
quantum-resistant-cryptography.author: Cryptography Team

content.0: As quantum computing advances, traditional cryptographic methods face potential vulnerabilities. TBURN is proactively addressing this with quantum-resistant implementations.
content.2: Hybrid Cryptography: Combining traditional and post-quantum algorithms for immediate security and future-proofing.
content.3: NIST-Approved Standards: Implementing cryptographic algorithms approved by NIST for post-quantum security.
content.4: Gradual Migration: Phased rollout of quantum-resistant features to ensure stability.
content.6: Transaction Signatures: All new transactions use quantum-resistant signature schemes.
content.7: Key Exchange: Secure key exchange protocols that resist quantum attacks.
content.8: Hash Functions: Multi-hash system with quantum-resistant options.
content.9: This proactive approach ensures TBURN remains secure even as quantum computing capabilities evolve.

tburn-dex-beta.title: TBURN DEX Beta Launch: Decentralized Trading is Here
tburn-dex-beta.description: The TBURN decentralized exchange is now in beta with multiple AMM curve types and AI-optimized routing.
tburn-dex-beta.author: DeFi Team

content.0: The TBURN DEX beta is now live, bringing decentralized trading to our ecosystem with advanced features and AI optimization.
content.2: Multiple AMM Types: Constant product, stable swap, and concentrated liquidity pools.
content.3: AI-Optimized Routing: Smart routing finds the best path across all pools for optimal swap rates.
content.4: MEV Protection: Built-in protection against sandwich attacks and front-running.
content.5: Low Fees: Competitive trading fees with discounts for high-volume traders.
content.6: Liquidity Provision: Earn fees by providing liquidity to pools. Our auto-compounding feature maximizes your returns.
content.7: Getting Started: Connect your wallet and start trading on the TBURN DEX today. Full documentation is available in our developer portal.
content.8: Join our community channels to provide feedback and help shape the future of decentralized trading on TBURN.

apiDocs.title: API Documentation
apiDocs.subtitle: Enterprise-grade REST API and WebSocket endpoints for building on TBURN Lab. Complete access to blockchain data, smart contracts, and real-time events.

overview.title: API Overview
overview.restfulApiDesc: JSON-based REST endpoints with comprehensive query parameters and filtering.
overview.websocketDesc: Real-time streaming for blocks, transactions, and smart contract events.
overview.enterpriseReadyDesc: 99.99% uptime SLA, dedicated support, and custom rate limits.

authentication.title: Authentication
authentication.apiKeyAuthDesc: All API requests require authentication using an API key. Include your key in the request header:
authentication.securityWarning: Never expose your API key in client-side code. Use server-side requests or environment variables.
authentication.step2: Navigate to API Keys section in your dashboard
authentication.step3: Generate a new API key and securely store it

rateLimits.title: Rate Limits
rateLimits.rateLimitHeadersDesc: Every API response includes rate limit information in the headers:
rateLimits.tooManyRequestsDesc: When rate limited, the API returns a 429 status with retry information:

block.title: Block Endpoints
block.getBlockByNumber: Retrieve detailed information about a specific block by its number or use 'latest' for the most recent block.
block.getLatestBlocks: Retrieve a paginated list of recent blocks with optional filtering.
block.getBlockTransactions: Get all transactions in a specific block with pagination support.

transaction.title: Transaction Endpoints
transaction.getTransaction: Retrieve detailed information about a transaction by its hash.
transaction.sendTransaction: Broadcast a signed transaction to the network.
transaction.getReceipt: Get the receipt of a mined transaction including logs and status.

account.title: Account Endpoints
account.getBalance: Get the native TBURN balance of an address.
account.getTokenBalances: Get all TBC-20 token balances for an address.
account.getTransactionHistory: Get paginated transaction history for an address.

smartContract.title: Smart Contract Endpoints
smartContract.getContractInfo: Get verified contract information including ABI and source code.
smartContract.callContract: Execute a read-only contract function call.
smartContract.getContractEvents: Get event logs emitted by a contract.

websocketEvents.title: Real-time Events
websocketEvents.description: Subscribe to real-time blockchain events via WebSocket connection.
